label.name: Name
label.optionplantdata: plantData: Calls the description dataset of the plant.
label.optiondevicedata: deviceData: Calls the description dataset of the plantdevice.
label.optionweather: weather: Calls the weather dataset of the plant.
label.optiontotaldata: totalData: Retrieves the data integrals. The sums since start time.
label.optionstatusdata: statusData: This is not available for all systems.
label.optiondevicetyp: deviceTyp: Add the device typ to the Output.
label.optionhistorylast: historyLast: The last data record from the system history table is called up here.
label.optionhistoryall: historyAll: All data records from the system history table is called up here.
